markers.title: Dragonbane Citadel
markers.description: Also referred to as the Kingdom of Avandria. Dragonbane Citadel is the capital of Avandria and home to the most ferocious warlords of the grand inquisitors.

markers.title: Oakstead
markers.description: Oakstead is the primary trade route for neighbouring regions willing to venture to Avandria. It is regarded the safest city in Avandria as it is protected by a high-noble of the grand inquisitors.

markers.title: Bridgewater
markers.description: Bridgewater is a quaint farming town which provisions neighbouring cities and local bandit groups with fresh harvests. Due to constant threat from conflict gangs, they often rely on the protection from a deadly bandit group bearing the insignia of a hydra with one of its heads cut off.

markers.title: Sable Creek
markers.description: Sable Creek is a small, quiet fishing village. Whilst they mostly keep to themselves, the locals are often seen in Oakstead gathering supplies each month. That is, until 3 months ago...

markers.title: Stormfall Grove
markers.description: Stormfall Grove is home to the Ravenarch Guild which are notorious for their prowess in relic hunting whilst also being known as a group of ferocious killers. The city was once a small town full of refugees but was renamed after the fall of Greytooth due to the intense storms incurred by the dense ash clouds nearby.
